Siconos Installation Guide

v0.0.0

Introduction

Siconos is a free (GNU license) software, dedicated to modeling, simulation and control of Non Smooth Dynamical Systems.

Usefull links:

Siconos Homepage: http://siconos.gforge.inria.fr/

Siconos download: https://gforge.inria.fr/frs/?group_id=9

Help and Documentations: https://gforge.inria.fr/docman/?group_id=9

See also:
Siconos Help and Documentation..

Aim of this document

This manual explains how to download and install the Siconos platform.
It also shortly describes the different required or optional libraries.
Contents:
  • Downloading Siconos
  • Prerequisite
  • Installing Siconos
